transcript: gray cloaks were already visible through the smoke, and an officer catching sight of Bagra- ti6n rushed shouting after the crowd of retreat- ing soldiers, ordering them back. Bagrati6n rode up to the ranks along which shots crackled now here and now there, drowning the sound of voices and the shouts of command. The whole air reeked with smoke.
